mapping:
Provides a mapping of elements specific to Geologic Time Version 3.0.0
DateMeasurement FeatureType gt:DateMeasurement gt:DateMeasurementType gt:DateMeasurementPropertyType
DatingProcedure FeatureType gt:DatingProcedure gt:DatingProcedureType gt:DatingProcedurePropertyType
StratigraphicDateEstimate Type gt:StratigraphicDateEstimate gt:StratigraphicDateEstimateType gt:StratigraphicDateEstimatePropertyType
GlobalStratotypePoint FeatureType gt:GlobalStratotypePoint gt:GlobalStratotypePointType gt:GlobalStratotypePointPropertyType
GlobalStratotypeSection FeatureType gt:GlobalStratotypeSection gt:GlobalStratotypeSectionType gt:GlobalStratotypeSectionPropertyType
StratigraphicPoint FeatureType gt:StratigraphicPoint gt:StratigraphicPointType gt:StratigraphicPointPropertyType
StratigraphicSection FeatureType gt:StratigraphicSection gt:StratigraphicSectionType gt:StratigraphicSectionPropertyType
TimeOrdinalEra Type gt:TimeOrdinalEra gt:TimeOrdinalEraType gt:TimeOrdinalEraPropertyType
TimeOrdinalEraBoundary Type gt:TimeOrdinalEraBoundary gt:TimeOrdinalEraBoundaryType gt:TimeOrdinalEraBoundaryPropertyType
TimeOrdinalReferenceSystem Type gt:TimeOrdinalReferenceSystem gt:TimeOrdinalReferenceSystemType gt:TimeOrdinalReferenceSystemPropertyType
